languages.text: {n}Здесь представлены два десятка основных команд — от кивков головы до комбинаций жестов. Все, что нужно, для быстрой и эффективной передачи данных о положении и численности противника, и даже согласования совместных атак.{/n}

{n}There are two dozen basic commands, from head nods to combinations of hand gestures. Everything you need to quickly and efficiently communicate enemy position and numbers, and even coordinate joint attacks.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Здесь представлены два десятка основных команд — от кивков головы до комбинаций жестов. Все, что нужно, для быстрой и эффективной передачи данных о положении и численности противника, и даже согласования совместных атак.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}There are two dozen basic commands, from head nods to combinations of hand gestures. Everything you need to quickly and efficiently communicate enemy position and numbers, and even coordinate joint attacks.{/n}

{n}There are two dozen basic commands, from head nods to combinations of hand gestures. Everything you need to quickly and efficiently communicate enemy position and numbers, and even coordinate joint attacks.{/n}

{n}There are two dozen basic commands, from head nods to combinations of hand gestures. Everything you need to quickly and efficiently communicate enemy position and numbers, and even coordinate joint attacks.{/n}

{n}There are two dozen basic commands, from head nods to combinations of hand gestures. Everything you need to quickly and efficiently communicate enemy position and numbers, and even coordinate joint attacks.{/n}

{n}There are two dozen basic commands, from head nods to combinations of hand gestures. Everything you need to quickly and efficiently communicate enemy position and numbers, and even coordinate joint attacks.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hay una veintena de signos básicos, desde movimientos leves de cabeza hasta combinaciones de gestos de mano. Cubren todo lo que necesitas para comunicar la posición y cantidad de los enemigos e incluso coordinar ataques conjuntos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There are two dozen basic commands, from head nods to combinations of hand gestures. Everything you need to quickly and efficiently communicate enemy position and numbers, and even coordinate joint attacks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hay una veintena de signos básicos, desde movimientos leves de cabeza hasta combinaciones de gestos de mano. Cubren todo lo que necesitas para comunicar la posición y cantidad de los enemigos e incluso coordinar ataques conjuntos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}数据板上记载着24个基本命令，从点头到手势组合不一而足。有了这些命令，你便可以快速、有效地沟通敌人的位置和数量，甚至可以发动联合攻击。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There are two dozen basic commands, from head nods to combinations of hand gestures. Everything you need to quickly and efficiently communicate enemy position and numbers, and even coordinate joint attacks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}数据板上记载着24个基本命令，从点头到手势组合不一而足。有了这些命令，你便可以快速、有效地沟通敌人的位置和数量，甚至可以发动联合攻击。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sur le document sont listés une bonne vingtaine de signaux basiques, allant de simples hochements de tête à des combinaisons plus complexes de gestes de la main. Tout ce dont vous avez besoin pour transmettre rapidement et efficacement la position et le nombre des ennemis, voire pour coordonner des attaques conjointes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There are two dozen basic commands, from head nods to combinations of hand gestures. Everything you need to quickly and efficiently communicate enemy position and numbers, and even coordinate joint attacks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sur le document sont listés une bonne vingtaine de signaux basiques, allant de simples hochements de tête à des combinaisons plus complexes de gestes de la main. Tout ce dont vous avez besoin pour transmettre rapidement et efficacement la position et le nombre des ennemis, voire pour coordonner des attaques conjointes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}うなずきからハンドジェスチャーの組み合わせまで2ダースの基本的なコマンドがある。迅速かつ効率的に敵の位置および数を伝達し、連携攻撃を行うときにも必要である。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There are two dozen basic commands, from head nods to combinations of hand gestures. Everything you need to quickly and efficiently communicate enemy position and numbers, and even coordinate joint attacks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}うなずきからハンドジェスチャーの組み合わせまで2ダースの基本的なコマンドがある。迅速かつ効率的に敵の位置および数を伝達し、連携攻撃を行うときにも必要である。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Baş sallamadan el hareketi kombinasyonlarına kadar yirmiye yakın temel komut var. Düşmanın konumunu ve sayısını hızlı ve etkili bir şekilde bildirmek, hatta ortak bir saldırı koordine etmek için ihtiyacın olan her şey mevcut.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There are two dozen basic commands, from head nods to combinations of hand gestures. Everything you need to quickly and efficiently communicate enemy position and numbers, and even coordinate joint attacks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Baş sallamadan el hareketi kombinasyonlarına kadar yirmiye yakın temel komut var. Düşmanın konumunu ve sayısını hızlı ve etkili bir şekilde bildirmek, hatta ortak bir saldırı koordine etmek için ihtiyacın olan her şey mevcut.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es gibt etwa zwei Dutzend Befehle, von einfachem Kopfnicken bis zu kombinierten Handgesten. Alles, was du brauchst, um Position und Anzahl von Gegnern schnell und effizient zu kommunizieren oder Angriffe zu koordinieren.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There are two dozen basic commands, from head nods to combinations of hand gestures. Everything you need to quickly and efficiently communicate enemy position and numbers, and even coordinate joint attacks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es gibt etwa zwei Dutzend Befehle, von einfachem Kopfnicken bis zu kombinierten Handgesten. Alles, was du brauchst, um Position und Anzahl von Gegnern schnell und effizient zu kommunizieren oder Angriffe zu koordinieren.{/n}
